text: Ana nen mbe nzuaim, mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe ana suaŋgi kameŋ, mbe ne mbararagiap, mbe guigira mba kaman vhuueŋ ga nzuav anan ndikndigap, mbe vhɨra ŋgava mbatɨga muuŋgiap, ndɨkndɨgi vhɨrver ana mbuav, khaŋ ana nzuai, “Nza kaŋgi, khe Zozevan kamara. Ana ram muuŋgiap kha khesharigi buni kaŋgip nta suaŋrie?”
